sentences.sContent: His analysis was rooted in a somewhat tendentious reading of French history.
sentences.sCn: 他的分析植根于对法国历史带有倾向性的解读。

synos.tran: 有偏见的，有倾向的；宣传性的

remMethod.val: tend(倾向) + ent(存在) + ious → 有倾向的 → 有偏见的

words.tran: 宣传性的；有支持某种立场的倾向

trans.tranCn: 有倾向的, 有偏见的
trans.tranOther: a tendentious speech, remark, book etc expresses a strong opinion that is intended to influence people
